name: Cost Calculator by AZEXO
author: azexo

sections.description:
This is add-on for Page Builder by AZEXO.

Main integrations

  • Popup Builder by AZEXO – showing form in popup
  • Marketing Automation by AZEXO – everything for digital marketing funnel, newsleter builder and sending
  • WooCommerce Product Options / Customizer – only paid version

This plugin very good suit for sell highly customizable products or services or provide mathematical help for your site visitors. Do you need to make a price calculator for Boeing? – this plugin for you. Moreover – if you need very simple calculator – this plugin best here too – because form stored in pure-HTML (no need front-end HTML generation) and all calculations work without AJAX – this make maximum performance which is possible on WordPress.

Powerful form builder

  • Front-end WYSIWYG form builder with big elements library and unlimited nested rows
  • Unlimited possibilities of forms layouts
  • Support of theme styles of form elements – form will look as other forms in theme
  • Plugin provide minimum CSS which is help with styles customization
  • Form have pure HTML storage format – which is help very good with advanced customization

Calculations

Any text element can have mathematical expression with strings concatenation and comparison operators – just click the right mouse button over text element to configure.

Conditional logic

Any form part can have visibility logic – just click the right mouse button over element to configure.

Submit confirmation builder

Any submit confirmation info in any form part with any layout and with calculations/conditions support. Useful for increase site conversion – by offering some mathematical help for your site visitor.

Order summary table builder

Any order summary in any form part with any layout and with calculations/conditions support.

Other features

  • Money/numbers format localization
  • Paypal integration with payment status synchronization (IPN support) – only in pro-version.
  • Multi-step form builder
  • Regular expression field value validation
  • Submissions notification email-template
  • re-Captcha support
  • Select field
  • Checkboxes
  • Radio buttons
  • Range slider
  • Date picker
  • File upload
  • Geolocation
  • Color picker
  • Color-fan radio buttons and checkboxes
  • Images radio buttons and checkboxes
  • Icons radio buttons and checkboxes
  • Table
  • Google map
  • Video
  • Icon
  • Custom image
  • Shortcodes supported
sections.installation:
1. Upload the azh_form folder to your plugins directory (e.g. /wp-content/plugins/)
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the instructions
sections.faq:
Why are there no FAQs besides this one?

Because you haven’t asked one yet.

short_description: Frontend drag & drop form builder for layouts any complexity.
